channel.title: emstreeR on ALLAN V. C. QUADROS
channel.description: Recent content in emstreeR on ALLAN V. C. QUADROS

item.title: Announcing the new 'emstreeR' package
item.description: I am proud to announce emstreeR - my first R package available on CRAN. emstreeR is a package for fast and easily computing Euclidean Minimum Spanning Trees (EMST). It heavily relies on RcppMLPACK and Rcpp to work as wrapper to the EMST Dual-Tree Boruvka algorithm (March, Ram, Gray, 2010) implemented in ‘mlpack’ - the C++ Machine Learning library (Curtin, 2005). With ‘emstreeR’, R users have access to the C++ fast EMST algorithm without having to deal with the R-Rcpp-C++ integration.
